team.name: Adrienne Kerr
team.about: I moved out to Seattle, WA to pursue music and tech and am currently a Full Stack Developer at Porch.com. When I'm not attending hackathons or teaching other women how to code, I'm on a bike, a mountain, an airplane, or on my saxophone.

team.name: Allan Yeung
team.about: Product manager with business and engineering background, with experience in developing and launching successful products at T-Mobile, Microsoft, and Intel. Product development experience portfolio includes T-Mobile Visual Voicemail, Microsoft Windows Phone, and Microsoft HoloLens.

team.name: Andy Barr
team.about: I help people implement their geo-databases (PostgreSQL + CartoDB). I am also able to help startups get their AWS deployments architected and set up. Additionally, I have done some data analytics and signal processing.

team.name: Darren Mills
team.about: I'm a branding and UX guru with the rare hybrid of IT & design expertise. Over the past 5 years I've built two startups, successfully raised funding and gained priceless management and leadership experience. I'm a knowledge junkie, science geek and life-long learner. I believe in always moving forward, constant progress and having strong intrinsic motivators. Entrepreneurship will always be a huge part of what I'm about. If you share any of these passions, we should grab coffee!
